definition: generic term for cotton or kapok/cotton/padded or quilted with cotton

sentences.english: It is better to allow for shrinkage when buying cotton clothes .
sentences.chinese: 买棉衣时最好要考虑到它们的缩水率。

sentences.english: Tomorrow is supposed to be mind-numbingly cold. I need to get out my heavy winter jacket.
sentences.chinese: 明天应该很是冷，我需要拿出我的厚棉衣了。

sentences.english: Do You Carry Any Padded Coat?
He then wrapped pieces of cotton in my whole body.
sentences.chinese: 他把那件棉衣整个裹在我身上。

sentences.english: Those who wear clothes made from bamboo say that they are as comfortable as cotton.
sentences.chinese: 穿过竹布衣服的人说，竹衣和棉衣一样舒服。

sentences.english: She was the warm coat I needed.
sentences.chinese: 她就是我所需要的那件温暖的棉衣。

sentences.english: Jade slave in the yard with his cotton-padded clothes cotton less, with our quarrel.
sentences.chinese: 玉奴在院子里不满自己的棉衣棉花少，跟下人吵架。

sentences.english: All our troops were issued thick cotton-padded coats.
sentences.chinese: 我们的战士都发了厚棉衣。

sentences.english: You can play outside with no winter coat.
sentences.chinese: 你可以不穿棉衣在外面玩耍。

sentences.english: Xie philosophy report to Sun Kexian cotton-padded clothes, they hurried back home to talk about.
sentences.chinese: 谢哲学向孙克贤汇报棉衣之事，他们急忙回家商谈。

sentences.english: The flying snowflakes have put heavy coats on the trees of the city ring park.
sentences.chinese: 纷纷扬扬的大雪给环城公园的树木穿上了“棉衣”。

sentences.english: She packed all our cotton-padded clothes in the trunk.
sentences.chinese: 她把我们的棉衣都装在一个大箱子里了。

sentences.english: Such a thin padded coat cannot ward off the cold mountain wind.
sentences.chinese: 这么薄的棉衣在高山上挡不住寒风。

definition: quilted cotton trousers/cotton-padded trousers (worn in winter)
coat/jacket/short and lined coat or robe
